price: Kuma lalle sun yi mãkirci irin makircinSu kuma a wurin Allah makircinsu, yake, kuma lalle ne makircinsu yã kasance, haƙĩƙa, duwãtsu sunã gushẽwã sabõda shi.
arabic: وَقَدۡ مَكَرُواْ مَكۡرَهُمۡ وَعِندَ ٱللَّهِ مَكۡرُهُمۡ وَإِن كَانَ مَكۡرُهُمۡ لِتَزُولَ مِنۡهُ ٱلۡجِبَالُ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waqad makarū makrahum waʿinda al-lahi makruhum wa-in kāna makruhum litazūla min'hu al-jibālu
